basic.description: This course explores strategies for the assessment and intervention of communication and symbolic abilities of infants (0-2) and children (3-5) with atypical communication development. Emphasis is on using a family focused approach in home based and center based programs.
basic.subject: SPA
basic.title: Communication Intervention: Infants and Preschoolers

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: LIN 3710, SPA 4400, or instructor permission.
